text.title: Learn Handyman Skills
text.head: Learn Handyman Skills
text.p: On-the-job experience is one of the best ways to learn handyman skills , but if you want to start a handyman business , you 'll usually need a business license and other formal certifications declaring your competency as a handyman . If you want to pursue a handyman career , start your training at home by performing simple maintenance on routine systems such as plumbing and heating . Later you can pursue formal vocational training , then go on to earn a handyman certification provided by your city or county .
text.head: Steps

list.item:
Look for basic repairs needed around your house . Whether you rent or own a home , every structure requires maintenance .
Stay ahead of seasonal repairs and maintenance by fixing problems before inclement weather occurs . Look for leaks in your roof in summer , before heavy rains occur . Check the furnace before the weather turns cold . Inspect your home for pest infestations during early spring , before the warm weather causes bugs to reproduce .

Acquaint yourself with home systems such as plumbing , one of the most common home systems that requires ongoing care . Learn how to use a plumber 's tools to perform basic maintenance on your home 's plumbing systems .
Keep drains running smoothly . Remove hair and other debris on a regular basis by employing the help of a drain snake .
Fix leaks . Look underneath sinks , behind toilets and around spigots to find free-flowing water . Discovering how to find a leak 's source is critical for any handyman to perform simple plumbing repairs without having to hire a licensed plumber .

Tell friends and family that you want to help with home repairs . Although most homes have similar systems , the more experience you have on different types of homes , the more skilled you 'll become at being a general handyman .
Get handyman training at a vocational school . Many adult education schools offer courses in basic handyman training . Check community college catalogs for course offerings .

Apprentice with an experienced handyman . Volunteer your services to act as an apprentice for a home repair expert . Although you wo n't get paid , you 'll receive free on-the-job training and guidance by a more experienced professional .

Study local building codes and contractor 's requirements . Each city has different criteria for handyman contractors who work on homes . Many will prohibit anyone but a licensed general contractor to make home repairs in excess of a certain dollar amount .
If you intend to earn money as a home handyman , know the scope of the type of projects you can work on before a contractor 's license is required by your city .

text.head: Tips

list.item: Projects such as Habitat for Humanity are always in need of volunteer construction labor . Learn handyman skills by volunteering to building a home for a needy family .

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Ensure that your friends and family know you are a handyman student . Do n't attempt to fix problems that are beyond your skill level or you could make the problem worse , as well as more expensive .
